channel.title: Craftsmanship on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Craftsmanship on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: What's New in November 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you dive in Dwarves is operated as a 50% company, 50% community. Everything we learn along the way of work, we transform into knowledge and distribute back to our tech community. If you want to get in touch, visit Dwarves Network Last November, we kicked off the Labs team, introduced Salary Advance for the Dwarves, upgraded note.d.foundation, supported Golang meetup, and demonstrated craftsmanship through various case studies and demos.

item.title: Careers
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we put Foundation in our name, we mean it. We want to put in place a team of go-getters who solve real-world problems, build big platforms, and spread goodwill across communities. Join us. Let’s create the next big things together. At Dwarves, you will be working with an experienced, talented team who loves technology and knows how to use technology to better life on a global level. Apply: Marketing and Communications Specialist How we work at Dwarves.
